content.text:
# 2020 Movieguide Awards

The 2020 Movieguide Awards ceremony honored the best films and television of 2019.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first, highlighted in boldface, and indicated with a double dagger ().
{| class=wikitable
|-
| valign="top" width="50%" style="background: yellow;" | Epiphany Prize for Most Inspiring Movie - Honoring movies that are wholesome, spiritually uplifting and inspirational
| valign="top" width="50%" style="background: yellow;" | Epiphany Prize for Most Inspiring TV Program
|- valign="top"
|

**A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood

**Harriet
**A Hidden Life
|

**The Chosen: Episode 8: "I Am He"

**Jesus: His Life: Episode 1: "Joseph: The Nativity"
**Last Man Standing: Episode 7.19: "The Passion of Paul"
**When Calls the Heart: "Home for Christmas"
|-
